interface.name: ddr3_sdram
interface.description: DDR3 board interface, it can use MIG IP for connection.

interface.name: eth_mdio_mdc
interface.description: Secondary interface to communicate with ethernet phy.

interface.name: eth_rgmii
interface.description: Primary interface to communicate with ethernet phy in RGMII mode.

interface.name: sys_clock
interface.description: 3.3V Single-Ended 100MHz oscillator used as system clock on the board

interface.name: usb_uart
interface.description: USB-to-UART Bridge, which allows a connection to a host computer with a USB port

component.name: push_buttons_5bits
component.description: Push Buttons 5 to 0 {Down Right Left Up Center}

component.name: usb_uart
component.description: USB-to-UART Bridge, which allows a connection to a host computer with a USB port

component.name: hdmi_in_tmds_comp
component.description: DVI/HDMI Sink: Requires Digilent's TMDS interface

component.name: hdmi_out_tmds_comp
component.description: DVI/HDMI Source: Requires Digilent's TMDS interface
